scriptures.content: but Jesus went to the Mount of Olives.
scriptures.section_title: The Woman Caught in Adultery

scriptures.content: <crossref let="b" cid="c43008002.1"/>Early in the morning he came again to the temple. All the people came to him, and <crossref let="c" cid="c43008002.2"/>he sat down and taught them.
scriptures.section_title: The Woman Caught in Adultery

scriptures.content: The scribes and the Pharisees brought a woman who had been caught in adultery, and placing her in the midst
scriptures.section_title: The Woman Caught in Adultery

scriptures.content: they said to him, "Teacher, this woman has been caught in the act of adultery.
scriptures.section_title: The Woman Caught in Adultery

scriptures.content: Now <crossref let="d" cid="c43008005.1"/>in the Law Moses commanded us <crossref let="e" cid="c43008005.2"/>to stone such women. So what do you say?"
scriptures.section_title: The Woman Caught in Adultery

scriptures.content: This they said <crossref let="f" cid="c43008006.1"/>to test him, <crossref let="g" cid="c43008006.2"/>that they might have some charge to bring against him. Jesus bent down and wrote with his finger on the ground.
scriptures.section_title: The Woman Caught in Adultery

scriptures.content: And as they continued to ask him, he stood up and said to them, <woc><crossref let="h" cid="c43008007.1"/>"Let him who is without sin among you <crossref let="i" cid="c43008007.2"/>be the first to throw a stone at her. "</woc>
scriptures.section_title: The Woman Caught in Adultery

scriptures.content: And once more he bent down and wrote on the ground.
scriptures.section_title: The Woman Caught in Adultery

scriptures.content: But when they heard it, they went away one by one, beginning with the older ones, and Jesus was left alone with the woman standing before him.
scriptures.section_title: The Woman Caught in Adultery

scriptures.content: Jesus stood up and said to her, <woc>"Woman, where are they? Has no one condemned you?"</woc>
scriptures.section_title: The Woman Caught in Adultery

scriptures.content: She said, "No one, Lord. " And Jesus said, <woc><crossref let="j" cid="c43008011.1"/>"Neither do I condemn you; go, and from now on <crossref let="k" cid="c43008011.2"/>sin no more. "</woc>]]
scriptures.section_title: The Woman Caught in Adultery

scriptures.content: <crossref let="l" cid="c43008012.1"/>Again Jesus spoke to them, saying, <woc><crossref let="m" cid="c43008012.2"/>"I am the light of the world. Whoever <crossref let="n" cid="c43008012.3"/>follows me will not <crossref let="o" cid="c43008012.4"/>walk in darkness, but will have the light of life. "</woc>
scriptures.section_title: I Am the Light of the World

scriptures.content: So the Pharisees said to him, <crossref let="p" cid="c43008013.1"/>"You are bearing witness about yourself; your testimony is not true. "
scriptures.section_title: I Am the Light of the World

scriptures.content: Jesus answered, <woc>"Even if I do bear witness about myself, <crossref let="q" cid="c43008014.1"/>my testimony is true, for I know <crossref let="r" cid="c43008014.2"/>where I came from and <crossref let="s" cid="c43008014.3"/>where I am going, but <crossref let="t" cid="c43008014.4"/>you do not know where I come from or where I am going. </woc>
scriptures.section_title: I Am the Light of the World

scriptures.content: <woc><crossref let="u" cid="c43008015.1"/>You judge according to the flesh; <crossref let="v" cid="c43008015.2"/>I judge no one. </woc>
scriptures.section_title: I Am the Light of the World

scriptures.content: Yet even if I do judge, my judgment is true, for it is not I alone who judge, but I and the FatherSome manuscripts he who sent me.
scriptures.section_title: I Am the Light of the World

scriptures.content: <woc><crossref let="y" cid="c43008017.1"/>In your Law it is written that the testimony of two people is true. </woc>
scriptures.section_title: I Am the Light of the World

scriptures.content: <woc>I am the one who bears witness about myself, and <crossref let="z" cid="c43008018.1"/>the Father who sent me bears witness about me. "</woc>
scriptures.section_title: I Am the Light of the World

scriptures.content: They said to him therefore, "Where is your Father?" Jesus answered, <woc><crossref let="a" cid="c43008019.1"/>"You know neither me nor my Father. <crossref let="b" cid="c43008019.2"/>If you knew me, you would know my Father also. "</woc>
scriptures.section_title: I Am the Light of the World

scriptures.content: These words he spoke in <crossref let="c" cid="c43008020.1"/>the treasury, as he taught in the temple; but <crossref let="d" cid="c43008020.2"/>no one arrested him, because <crossref let="e" cid="c43008020.3"/>his hour had not yet come.
scriptures.section_title: I Am the Light of the World

scriptures.content: So he said to them again, <woc><crossref let="f" cid="c43008021.1"/>"I am going away, and <crossref let="g" cid="c43008021.2"/>you will seek me, and <crossref let="h" cid="c43008021.3"/>you will die in your sin. Where I am going, you cannot come. "</woc>
scriptures.section_title: I Am the Light of the World

scriptures.content: So the Jews said, <crossref let="i" cid="c43008022.1"/>"Will he kill himself, since he says, <woc>'Where I am going, you cannot come'</woc>?"
scriptures.section_title: I Am the Light of the World

scriptures.content: He said to them, <woc><crossref let="j" cid="c43008023.1"/>"You are from below; I am from above. <crossref let="k" cid="c43008023.2"/>You are of this world; <crossref let="l" cid="c43008023.3"/>I am not of this world. </woc>
scriptures.section_title: I Am the Light of the World

scriptures.content: <woc>I told you that you <crossref let="m" cid="c43008024.1"/>would die in your sins, for <crossref let="n" cid="c43008024.2"/>unless you believe that <crossref let="o" cid="c43008024.3"/>I am he you will die in your sins. "</woc>
scriptures.section_title: I Am the Light of the World

scriptures.content: So they said to him, <crossref let="p" cid="c43008025.1"/>"Who are you?" Jesus said to them, <woc>"Just what I have been telling you from the beginning. </woc>
scriptures.section_title: I Am the Light of the World

scriptures.content: <woc>I have much to say about you and much to judge, but <crossref let="q" cid="c43008026.1"/>he who sent me is true, and I declare <crossref let="r" cid="c43008026.2"/>to the world <crossref let="s" cid="c43008026.3"/>what I have heard from him. "</woc>
scriptures.section_title: I Am the Light of the World

scriptures.content: They did not understand that <crossref let="t" cid="c43008027.1"/>he had been speaking to them about the Father.
scriptures.section_title: I Am the Light of the World

scriptures.content: So Jesus said to them, <woc>"When you have <crossref let="u" cid="c43008028.1"/>lifted up the Son of Man, <crossref let="v" cid="c43008028.2"/>then you will know that <crossref let="w" cid="c43008028.3"/>I am he, and that <crossref let="x" cid="c43008028.4"/>I do nothing on my own authority, but <crossref let="y" cid="c43008028.5"/>speak just as the Father taught me. </woc>
scriptures.section_title: I Am the Light of the World

scriptures.content: <woc>And <crossref let="z" cid="c43008029.1"/>he who sent me is with me. <crossref let="z" cid="c43008029.2"/>He has not left me alone, for <crossref let="a" cid="c43008029.3"/>I always do the things that are pleasing to him. "</woc>
scriptures.section_title: I Am the Light of the World

scriptures.content: As he was saying these things, <crossref let="b" cid="c43008030.1"/>many believed in him.
scriptures.section_title: I Am the Light of the World

scriptures.content: So Jesus said to the Jews who had believed in him, <woc><crossref let="c" cid="c43008031.1"/>"If you abide in my word, you are truly my disciples,</woc>
scriptures.section_title: The Truth Will Set You Free

scriptures.content: <woc>and you will <crossref let="d" cid="c43008032.1"/>know the truth, and the truth <crossref let="e" cid="c43008032.2"/>will set you free. "</woc>
scriptures.section_title: The Truth Will Set You Free

scriptures.content: They answered him, <crossref let="f" cid="c43008033.1"/>"We are offspring of Abraham and have never been enslaved to anyone. How is it that you say, 'You will become free'?"
scriptures.section_title: The Truth Will Set You Free

scriptures.content: Jesus answered them, "Truly, truly, I say to you, everyone who commits sin is a slaveGreek bondservant; also verse 35 to sin.
scriptures.section_title: The Truth Will Set You Free

scriptures.content: <woc><crossref let="h" cid="c43008035.1"/>The slave does not remain in the house forever; <crossref let="i" cid="c43008035.2"/>the son remains forever. </woc>
scriptures.section_title: The Truth Will Set You Free

scriptures.content: <woc>So if the Son sets you free, you will be free indeed. </woc>
scriptures.section_title: The Truth Will Set You Free

scriptures.content: <woc>I know that you are offspring of Abraham; yet <crossref let="j" cid="c43008037.1"/>you seek to kill me because my word finds no place in you. </woc>
scriptures.section_title: The Truth Will Set You Free

scriptures.content: <woc><crossref let="k" cid="c43008038.1"/>I speak of what I have seen with my Father, and you do what you have heard <crossref let="l" cid="c43008038.2"/>from your father. "</woc>
scriptures.section_title: The Truth Will Set You Free

scriptures.content: They answered him, <crossref let="m" cid="c43008039.1"/>"Abraham is our father. " Jesus said to them, <woc><crossref let="n" cid="c43008039.2"/>"If you were Abraham's children, you would be doing the works Abraham did,</woc>
scriptures.section_title: You Are of Your Father the Devil

scriptures.content: <woc>but now <crossref let="o" cid="c43008040.1"/>you seek to kill me, a man who has told you the truth <crossref let="p" cid="c43008040.2"/>that I heard from God. This is not what Abraham did. </woc>
scriptures.section_title: You Are of Your Father the Devil

scriptures.content: <woc>You are doing the works your father did. "</woc> They said to him, <crossref let="q" cid="c43008041.1"/>"We were not born of sexual immorality. We have <crossref let="r" cid="c43008041.2"/>one Father - even God. "
scriptures.section_title: You Are of Your Father the Devil

scriptures.content: Jesus said to them, <woc><crossref let="s" cid="c43008042.1"/>"If God were your Father, you would love me, for <crossref let="t" cid="c43008042.2"/>I came from God and <crossref let="u" cid="c43008042.3"/>I am here. <crossref let="v" cid="c43008042.4"/>I came not of my own accord, but <crossref let="w" cid="c43008042.5"/>he sent me. </woc>
scriptures.section_title: You Are of Your Father the Devil

scriptures.content: <woc><crossref let="x" cid="c43008043.1"/>Why do you not understand what I say? It is because you cannot <crossref let="y" cid="c43008043.2"/>bear to hear my word. </woc>
scriptures.section_title: You Are of Your Father the Devil

scriptures.content: <woc><crossref let="z" cid="c43008044.1"/>You are of your father the devil, and your will is to do your father's desires. <crossref let="a" cid="c43008044.2"/>He was a murderer from the beginning, and <crossref let="b" cid="c43008044.3"/>has nothing to do with the truth, because there is no truth in him. <crossref let="c" cid="c43008044.4"/>When he lies, he speaks out of his own character, for he is a liar and the father of lies. </woc>
scriptures.section_title: You Are of Your Father the Devil

scriptures.content: <woc>But because I tell the truth, you do not believe me. </woc>
scriptures.section_title: You Are of Your Father the Devil

scriptures.content: <woc>Which one of you convicts me of sin? If I tell the truth, why do you not believe me?</woc>
scriptures.section_title: You Are of Your Father the Devil

scriptures.content: <woc><crossref let="d" cid="c43008047.1"/>Whoever is of God hears the words of God. <crossref let="e" cid="c43008047.2"/>The reason why you do not hear them is that <crossref let="f" cid="c43008047.3"/>you are not of God. "</woc>
scriptures.section_title: You Are of Your Father the Devil

scriptures.content: The Jews answered him, "Are we not right in saying that you are a Samaritan and <crossref let="g" cid="c43008048.1"/>have a demon?"
scriptures.section_title: Before Abraham Was, I Am

scriptures.content: Jesus answered, <woc>"I do not have a demon, but <crossref let="h" cid="c43008049.1"/>I honor my Father, and you dishonor me. </woc>
scriptures.section_title: Before Abraham Was, I Am

scriptures.content: <woc>Yet <crossref let="i" cid="c43008050.1"/>I do not seek my own glory; there is One who seeks it, and he is the judge. </woc>
scriptures.section_title: Before Abraham Was, I Am

scriptures.content: <woc>Truly, truly, <crossref let="j" cid="c43008051.1"/>I say to you, if anyone keeps my word, he will never <crossref let="k" cid="c43008051.2"/>see death. "</woc>
scriptures.section_title: Before Abraham Was, I Am

scriptures.content: The Jews said to him, "Now we know that you have a demon! <crossref let="l" cid="c43008052.1"/>Abraham died, as did the prophets, yet <crossref let="m" cid="c43008052.2"/>you say, <woc>'If anyone keeps my word, he will never <crossref let="n" cid="c43008052.3"/>taste death. '</woc>
scriptures.section_title: Before Abraham Was, I Am

scriptures.content: <crossref let="o" cid="c43008053.1"/>Are you greater than our father Abraham, who died? And the prophets died! Who do you make yourself out to be?"
scriptures.section_title: Before Abraham Was, I Am

scriptures.content: Jesus answered, "If I glorify myself, my glory is nothing. It is my Father who glorifies me, of whom you say, 'He is our God. 'Some manuscripts your God
scriptures.section_title: Before Abraham Was, I Am

scriptures.content: <woc>But <crossref let="s" cid="c43008055.1"/>you have not known him. <crossref let="t" cid="c43008055.2"/>I know him. If I were to say that I do not know him, I would be <crossref let="u" cid="c43008055.3"/>a liar <crossref let="v" cid="c43008055.4"/>like you, but I do know him and I keep his word. </woc>
scriptures.section_title: Before Abraham Was, I Am

scriptures.content: <woc><crossref let="w" cid="c43008056.1"/>Your father Abraham <crossref let="x" cid="c43008056.2"/>rejoiced <crossref let="y" cid="c43008056.3"/>that he would see my day. <crossref let="z" cid="c43008056.4"/>He saw it and was glad. "</woc>
scriptures.section_title: Before Abraham Was, I Am

scriptures.content: So the Jews said to him, "You are not yet fifty years old, and have you seen Abraham?"Some manuscripts has Abraham seen you?
scriptures.section_title: Before Abraham Was, I Am

scriptures.content: Jesus said to them, <woc>"Truly, truly, I say to you, before Abraham was, <crossref let="a" cid="c43008058.1"/>I am. "</woc>
scriptures.section_title: Before Abraham Was, I Am

scriptures.content: So <crossref let="b" cid="c43008059.1"/>they picked up stones to throw at him, but Jesus hid himself and went out of the temple. <end-chapter/>
scriptures.section_title: Before Abraham Was, I Am
